title: Consolidation of Overlapping Approved/Pending Proposals
abstract: This proposal consolidates overlapping proposals that are currently Approved or Pending into a small set of umbrella tracks. The aim is to reduce duplication, clarify ownership, and accelerate delivery while preserving the original intent and attribution of each source proposal.
motivation: Multiple Approved and Pending proposals target similar problem spaces (security/integrity, testing/validation/benchmarks, observability/knowledge, review governance, scalability/performance, inter-model communication). Unifying these into umbrella tracks reduces coordination cost, establishes clearer milestones, improves architectural coherence, and accelerates implementation.
rationale: Umbrella tracks provide a portfolio view with well-defined boundaries and shared primitives. Only proposals in Approved and Pending directories are included to respect governance outcomes and avoid reintroducing rejected scopes.
specification: Consolidation framework creating umbrella tracks with lead proposals and merge sources, including Security & Integrity Suite, Quality Testing & Validation, Governance Observability Platform, Review Governance Suite, Scalability & Performance Program, Inter-Model Communication, and Model Governance Registry.

implementation.overview: Comprehensive consolidation creating 7 umbrella tracks from overlapping proposals

tasks: Analyze overlapping proposals and identify consolidation opportunities
Create umbrella track structure with lead and merge sources
Establish consolidation framework and attribution preservation
Migrate original proposals to appropriate directories

successCriteria: All overlapping proposals successfully consolidated into 7 umbrella tracks
Original intent and attribution preserved for all source proposals
Clear ownership and implementation roadmap established

benefits: Reduced coordination cost and conflicting scopes between proposals
Clearer milestones and ownership for implementation planning
Improved architectural coherence across cross-cutting concerns
Accelerated implementation with shared foundations and primitives
challenges: Maintaining original proposal intent during consolidation
Coordination across multiple proposal authors and stakeholders
nextSteps: Continue implementation of consolidated umbrella tracks
Monitor consolidation effectiveness and adjust as needed
